houses.paranormal_feature: every Friday 13 the evil comes and turn your life to nightmare
Gives you a harsh feeling, full of sorrows and grief. Your pets are acting strange.
with such address you can become a Devil-manager in 2 years
Odors inexplicably emerge from a localized area during a specific time of day
Weird sounds like whispering voices might indicate that another being is trying to get your attention.
Frigidly cold areas of a room, as well as a sudden drop in temperature (usually between 20-30 degrees), can mean there’s a ghost among you.
TVs or electronic devices turning on and off can be a sign that an entity is pulling its energy from your power source.
Missing objects are found in strange areas of your home, in places other than where they were left or are usually kept.

houses.description: You have strange dreams you’ve never experienced before, and at night, feel a sensation of touch as though something or someone is reaching out to you.
